}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WMTM-169GN_WiFi_V01 is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Gemtek]] WMTM-169GN Presumed 00:26:87 OUI based on the FCC label.
===Hardware specifications=== *CPU: ''[[MediaTek]]'' MT7620N @580MHz (MIPS 24KEc) :802.11bgn (2T2R) WiSoC, used 1x antenna/streams *RAM: 64MB (DDR2 SDRAM) *Storage: 16MB (Serial Flash) *Battery: 1810mAh 3.8V (Li-ion)
==Links of Interest== [http://www.kingston.com/datasheets/mlw221_us.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://www.kingston.com/us/landing/widriveplus Firmware (Beta)]
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/kingston/mlw221 ''Kingston MobileLite Wireless MLW221'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N 802.11bgn (1T1R) • [http://wiki.openwrt.org/_media/media/mlw221-03.jpg 150Mbps] :Flash: ''Spansion'' S25FL129P1 (16MB) :RAM: ''SK hynix'' H5PS5162GFR (64MB) :WAN : 1x FE (100Mbps), Serial mod :Li-ion 1810mAh 3.8V [https://openwrt.org/_detail/media/kingston/mlw221-01.jpg battery]
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=48401 ''Kingston G1 (MLW221)'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :''MobileLite Wireless'' G1 & [http://www.kingston.com/us/wireless/wireless_readers/mlwg2 G2] ([http://up.picr.de/19745980tv.jpg PCB]) :G1 - Li-ion 1810mAh 3.8V battery :G2 - Li-ion 4640mAh 3.8V battery
